thread.title: Glenmede Announces Chief Investment Officer Appointments

author: cnbc.com
title: Glenmede Announces Chief Investment Officer Appointments
text:
Stephen Lehman named CIO for Endowments and Foundations; Jason Pride named CIO for Private Clients
PHILADELPHIA--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- The Glenmede Trust Company, a privately-held and independently owned investment and wealth management firm with $40 billion in assets under management (AUM), today announced the appointments of Stephen C. Lehman, CFA, as Chief Investment Officer for Endowments & Foundations, and Jason Pride, CFA, as Chief Investment Officer for the Private Client business. Both continue to report to Gordon B. Fowler, Glenmede’s Chief Executive Officer and Chief Investment Officer.
The establishment of dedicated Chief Investment Officers is a natural extension of Glenmede’s commitment to providing specialized and tailored investment acumen and execution. In his new role, Lehman oversees investment strategy and portfolio allocation decisions, including manager selection and tactical rebalancing, for all endowment, foundation and nonprofit clients. Pride, a leading member of the firm’s Investment Policy Committee, is responsible for defining the macroeconomic market outlook and investment strategy framework governing allocation of private client assets.
“Our investment management business has been organically developed with one goal: to bring forth the insights and services to best serve our nonprofit and taxable clients,” said Fowler. “By investing in proven leaders, we harness the mindshare and resources to serve our clients’ best interests.”
Founded in 1956 to manage the assets of the Pew trusts, the Company today oversees $9 billion on behalf of more than 220 nonprofit and charitable institutions, and $21 billion for more than 1,500 private client relationships.
Lehman joined Glenmede to manage the Pew trusts in 2001 from Columbia University, where he had been Senior Director of investments for the endowment fund. Pride joined the firm as Director of Investment Strategy in 2009 from the Haverford Trust Company, where he served as Director of Research.
About Glenmede
The Glenmede Trust Company, N.A., (“Glenmede”) is among the nation's leading investment and wealth management firms with $40 billion of assets under management for high-net-worth individuals, families, family offices, endowment, foundation and institutional clients. Headquartered in Philadelphia, the firm has offices in Ohio, Delaware, New Jersey, New York and Washington DC. For further information, please visit www.glenmede.com .
